labels.role_reason: Introduction to the topic of decision frameworks.

Explaining the difficulty in distinguishing duty and virtue frameworks.
Mentioning weaving between frameworks and providing examples.
Transitioning to discuss consequentialist framework.

Connecting consequentialism to utilitarianism.

Defining utilitarianism as maximizing general good.

Highlighting the difficulty in defining individual utility.
